short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically replaces AI-related terms with whimsical fantasy phrases on non-Google websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the enchanting world of Wizard Magic, a delightful and lighthearted browser extension that transforms your online experience with a touch of whimsy. This entertaining extension casts its spell on articles, blog posts, and web pages, replacing mundane AI and technology-related phrases with imaginative, magical terms inspired by fantasy lore.

Unleash the power of Wizard Magic to turn everyday content into captivating stories filled with charming and playful elements. Whether you're a fantasy enthusiast or simply seeking a moment of amusement, this extension adds a dash of fun to your browsing sessions, bringing joy and laughter to users of all ages.

Embrace the enchantment and let Wizard Magic brighten your digital world, one magical phrase at a time!
